description: The 'general_feedback' dataset is designed to capture and analyze user interactions and feedback related to a knowledge bank and a language learning model (LLM). This dataset is particularly useful for understanding user behavior, preferences, and the effectiveness of the LLM in providing information or assistance. Each entry in the dataset includes a timestamp, the user identifier, the message content, and references to both the knowledge bank and the LLM. This structure allows for detailed analysis of how users interact with the system, what types of queries are most common, and how effectively the LLM responds to these queries. Potential use cases include improving the LLM's response accuracy, enhancing the knowledge bank's content, and tailoring user experiences based on feedback trends. The dataset's unique feature is its focus on capturing real-time user feedback in conjunction with LLM interactions, providing a comprehensive view of the user experience.
shortDesc: General feedback dataset with user messages and LLM interactions.

columns.name: date
columns.comment: Timestamp of the feedback entry, indicating when it was recorded.

columns.name: user
columns.comment: Identifier for the user providing feedback, ensuring traceability.

columns.name: message
columns.comment: Content of the user's feedback message, detailing their input.

columns.name: knowledgebank
columns.comment: Reference to the knowledge bank used during the interaction.

columns.name: llm
columns.comment: Reference to the language learning model involved in the interaction.
